com.brashmonkey.spriter

Class Spriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brashmonkey.spriter.Spriter

  • public class Spriter
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for managing multiple Loader and Player instances.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Spriter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void dispose()
      Clears all previous created players, Spriter datas, disposes all loaders, deletes the drawer and resets all internal lists.
      static void draw()
      Draws each created player by this class.
      static Drawer drawer()
      Returns the drawer instance this class is using.
      static Data getData(java.lang.String fileName)
      Returns the data for the given SCML filename.
      static Loader<?> getLoader(java.lang.String scmlFile)
      Returns a loader for the given SCML filename.
      static void init(java.lang.Class<? extends Loader> loaderClass, java.lang.Class<? extends Drawer> drawerClass)
      Initializes this class with the implemented Loader class and Drawer class.
      static void load(java.io.File scmlFile)
      Loads the given SCML file.
      static void load(java.io.InputStream stream, java.lang.String scmlFile)
      Loads the given SCML stream pointing to a file saved at the given path.
      static void load(java.lang.String scmlFile)
      Loads a SCML file with the given path.
      static Player newPlayer(java.lang.String scmlFile, int entityIndex)
      Creates a new Player instance based on the given SCML file with the given entity index

      Creates a new Player instance based on the given SCML file with the given entity index and the given class extending a Player

      Creates a new Player instance based on the given SCML file with the given entity name
      static int players()
      The number of players this class is managing.
      static void setDrawerDependencies(java.lang.Object... drawerDependencies)
      Sets the dependencies for implemented Drawer.
      static void setLoaderDependencies(java.lang.Object... loaderDependencies)
      Sets the dependencies for implemented Loader.
      static void update()
      Updates each created player by this class.
      static void updateAndDraw()
      Updates each created player by this class and immediately draws it.

    • Method Detail

      • setLoaderDependencies

        public static void setLoaderDependencies(java.lang.Object... loaderDependencies)
        Sets the dependencies for implemented Loader.
        Parameters:
        loaderDependencies - the dependencies a loader has to get

      • setDrawerDependencies

        public static void setDrawerDependencies(java.lang.Object... drawerDependencies)
        Sets the dependencies for implemented Drawer.
        Parameters:
        drawerDependencies - the dependencies a drawer has to get

      • init

        public static void init(java.lang.Class<? extends Loader> loaderClass,
                        java.lang.Class<? extends Drawer> drawerClass)
        Initializes this class with the implemented Loader class and Drawer class. Before calling this method make sure that you have set all necessary dependecies with setDrawerDependencies(Object...) and setLoaderDependencies(Object...). A drawer is created with this method.
        Parameters:
        loaderClass - the loader class
        drawerClass - the drawer class

      • load

        public static void load(java.lang.String scmlFile)
        Loads a SCML file with the given path.
        Parameters:
        scmlFile - the path to the SCML file

      • load

        public static void load(java.io.File scmlFile)
        Loads the given SCML file.
        Parameters:
        scmlFile - the scml file

      • load

        public static void load(java.io.InputStream stream,
                        java.lang.String scmlFile)
        Loads the given SCML stream pointing to a file saved at the given path.
        Parameters:
        stream - the SCML stream
        scmlFile - the path to the SCML file

      • newPlayer

        public static Player newPlayer(java.lang.String scmlFile,
                               int entityIndex)
        Creates a new Player instance based on the given SCML file with the given entity index
        Parameters:
        scmlFile - name of the SCML file
        entityIndex - the index of the entity
        Returns:
        a Player instance managed by this class
        Throws:
        SpriterException - if the given SCML file was not loaded yet

      • newPlayer

        public static Player newPlayer(java.lang.String scmlFile,
                               int entityIndex,
                               java.lang.Class<? extends Player> playerClass)
        Creates a new Player instance based on the given SCML file with the given entity index and the given class extending a Player
        Parameters:
        scmlFile - name of the SCML file
        entityIndex - the index of the entity
        playerClass - the class extending a Player class, e.g. PlayerTweener.
        Returns:
        a Player instance managed by this class
        Throws:
        SpriterException - if the given SCML file was not loaded yet

      • newPlayer

        public static Player newPlayer(java.lang.String scmlFile,
                               java.lang.String entityName)
        Creates a new Player instance based on the given SCML file with the given entity name
        Parameters:
        scmlFile - name of the SCML file
        entityName - name of the entity
        Returns:
        a Player instance managed by this class
        Throws:
        SpriterException - if the given SCML file was not loaded yet

      • getLoader

        public static Loader<?> getLoader(java.lang.String scmlFile)
        Returns a loader for the given SCML filename.
        Parameters:
        scmlFile - the name of the SCML file
        Returns:
        the loader for the given SCML filename
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the SCML file was not loaded yet

      • updateAndDraw

        public static void updateAndDraw()
        Updates each created player by this class and immediately draws it. This method should only be called if you want to update and render on the same thread.
        Throws:
        SpriterException - if init(Class, Class) was not called before

      • update

        public static void update()
        Updates each created player by this class.
        Throws:
        SpriterException - if init(Class, Class) was not called before

      • draw

        public static void draw()
        Draws each created player by this class.
        Throws:
        SpriterException - if init(Class, Class) was not called before

      • drawer

        public static Drawer drawer()
        Returns the drawer instance this class is using.
        Returns:
        the drawer which draws all players

      • getData

        public static Data getData(java.lang.String fileName)
        Returns the data for the given SCML filename.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the SCML file
        Returns:
        the data for the given SCML filename or null if not loaed yet

      • players

        public static int players()
        The number of players this class is managing.
        Returns:
        number of players

      • dispose

        public static void dispose()
        Clears all previous created players, Spriter datas, disposes all loaders, deletes the drawer and resets all internal lists. After this methods was called init(Class, Class) has to be called again so that everything works again.
